title: $100 for best deal (single card or lot)
author: ksemmel

posts.post_title: $100 for best deal (single card or lot)
posts.post_content: I am starting to collect t206s a little bit and have 5-6 at the moment. I currently have $100 to spend on the best deal give. Whether that be 1 single card or a lot of T206s. Please post pictures with the price you are looking for.
These two for a cool $100 via Paypal f/f if you're interested:
Raw or graded. Either works for me

Lot of 2 (PayPal no fees)
I removed Phillippe because it just sold on eBay.

Alternatively - Pick 1 (PayPal no fees)
Chance is SOLD
That Chance is a beauty JC!

Thanks Luke, I'm not real familiar with the background of this card.  Do you know, would this be considered an orange variation, and if so, is it more rare? Just curious, I'm not going to change the offer :D

I think it falls within the normal spectrum of orange/red for this card.  Definitely more towards orange than most.  But it is an extremely nice 2, so it ahould sell for a premium because of that (assumung the back doesn't have issues).
That Chance does look nicer than the other two cards with the higher grades.  :)
I see, back is the reason for the grade.  Still a really nice card.  If I were the OP, I'd strongly consider that one.
Right, if you can stomach a little backside paper loss, it's a beauty.

I agree with the thoughts on the Chance, that would be a fun one to own. I must admit that I have been considering that card on Ebay and it is even more tempting here on BST now that I see it is a board member!
Chance paid for along with a 6 card lot bought, thank you guys. will being looking to purchase a $200-250 lot in the next week or two if anyone has one I wouldn't mind taking a look
